Abnormal Security recently secured our series D round of financing at $250 million and are growing like a rocket in every way. If you're looking for personal as well as company growth, you won't find a better company than Abnormal Security!

I am the Director of Engineering for the Messaging Security Products Division. We build the user-facing products for inbound email security and have many interesting challenges working at massive scale.
